function showInFront(id){hideinFront();document.getElementById(id).classList.remove("hide");document.getElementById(id).classList.add("inFront");document.getElementById("hintergrund").classList.remove("hide");document.getElementById("hintergrund").classList.add("inFront");lastInFront=id;centerElement(id);window.addEventListener("resize",function(){centerElement(id);});}function hideinFront(){if(lastInFront!==undefined){document.getElementById(lastInFront).classList.add("hide");document.getElementById(lastInFront).classList.remove("inFront");document.getElementById("hintergrund").classList.add("hide");document.getElementById("hintergrund").classList.remove("inFront");}}function centerElement(id){var x=window.innerWidth/2;var ele=document.getElementById(id);ele.style.right=x-ele.offsetWidth/2+"px";ele.style.top=window.pageYOffset+100+"px";document.getElementById("hintergrund").style.height=document.body.scrollHeight+"px";}export default Navbar1;
